mapper.select: SELECT c.*, cpr.id cpr_id, cpr.product_id cpr_product_id, cpr.product_name cpr_product_name, cpr.product_sn cpr_product_sn, cpcr.id cpcr_id, cpcr.product_category_id cpcr_product_category_id, cpcr.product_category_name cpcr_product_category_name, cpcr.parent_category_name cpcr_parent_category_name FROM sms_coupon c LEFT JOIN sms_coupon_product_relation cpr ON c.id = cpr.coupon_id LEFT JOIN sms_coupon_product_category_relation cpcr ON c.id = cpcr.coupon_id WHERE c.id = #{id}
